thread.title: Ducklings stuck in tarmac on warmest ever day in July
thread.title_full: Ducklings stuck in tarmac on warmest ever day in July

author: Emma Mills
title: Ducklings stuck in tarmac on warmest ever day in July
text: Ducklings stuck in tarmac on warmest ever day in July Panicked ducklings were found stuck in tarmac as roads melted in temperatures up to 36.7C One of five ducklings being washed down after they were found stuck fast in tarmac in Ashill, Norfolk Photo: RSPCA/PA By Emma Mills
